thread.title: Digital Sales Manager - Philadelphia - Sports Media
thread.title_full: Digital Sales Manager - Philadelphia - Sports Media

title: Digital Sales Manager - Philadelphia - Sports Media
text: Posted/Updated: 10-13-2015 Brief Job Description: The Digital Sales Manager will report to the Vice President of Advertising Sales and will be responsible for managing the new media efforts for the multiple websites (listed below)...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
